content.html: how to become a tech twitter influencer in five easy steps! 1. be relatable 2. keep a regular posting schedule 3. engage with your followers 4. use your newfound influence to get a position at the racist planet-burning company 5. go on podcasts!
content.value:
how to become a tech twitter influencer in five easy steps!

1. be relatable
2. keep a regular posting schedule
3. engage with your followers
4. use your newfound influence to get a position at the racist planet-burning company
5. go on podcasts!
